tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: "As Long As You Love Me" by Justin Bieber, cover by CIMORELLI
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: This is our 3rd in a series of 4 videos dedicated to AT&T's "It Can Wait" campaign. Please take the pledge to not text and drive at itcanwait.com Please share this video, and if you're on Twitter, use the hash tag #itcanwait. Special thanks to our friend Erik Lauer for filming and editing this video! The choreography is by Cimorelli and Claire L. If you just stumbled upon us, we are 6 sisters originally from Northern California. Thanks for watching, and we hope you enjoy the video! :D cimorellimusic.com http twitter.com
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Keyword: As Long As You Love Me

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: This﻿ song is better than JB ! Cette chanson est mieux que celle de JB !
but next time dont do that you bieberfever.but i'm sorry 'bout that.because i﻿ love cimorelli som much
it can wait! ﻿
just paused at 1:54﻿ and admired
thumbs up if﻿ your a cimfan

Are you freaking kidding me? They﻿ absolutely killed it!!! Every note was amazing, the dance moves were killer and they looked fabulous doing them! Every single second was FAN-TAS-TIC! keep going girls, you are my favorite band and dont let haters ruin your day!!! LOVE YOU ALL
J'adore﻿ !!!
this is a cover and﻿ not the original song! so be quiet!
Fav sing they﻿ covered

sorry.... But the their version is better... seriously why are u here if ur a bieber Fan.... it doesn't matter if u liked it or no.. others liked.. it... ur just﻿ one of 9 others who listened to the cover and liked.. it :) * This is much better than the original song Keep it up Girls.. and the Thumps.. up if u think like me :)*
good﻿ as always ;)
Let Them Out of The Kitchen They Said.. It'll﻿ Fun They Said...
i love i like cool cool﻿ coooooooooolllll i m fan

Well that was AMAZING! I love when there's a rap section for Lauren to Dani to take on, they always pull it off & make it look easy! I've always said I don't have a favorite Cimorelli sister & I still don't... they each are so good at specific aspects of music-making its impossible to come out & say that﻿ one is better than the other because it simply isn't true... even Dani, the youngest of the group, completely holds up her end by being just as fierce as the eldest member! Love them! :)
Dani ROCKS! ﻿
Song*﻿
LOVE IT﻿

i remember one of those comments on an old video﻿ saying dani was ugly and someone else said "dani is gonna be a hottie! just watch!" well HALLELUJAH TO THE DUDE WHO SAID SHE'S A HOTTIE CUZ SHE IS NOW! lol so pretty dani :)
Honestly, Im very sorry you have hearing problems.﻿
Good or﻿ bad killed?
you are awesome girls! this is my favourite cover :D keep going <3﻿
they are amazing and u know﻿ it ur just looking for attention you will never be as good as them, and they are 1million times better than justin!
i'm jealous of Lauren her hair!﻿
better than the﻿ original version :) Justin should watch this

Reviewer.Movies: Mean girls, This is England, Angus, thongs and perfect snogging etc.
Reviewer.Music: A Day To Remember, Close Your Eyes, We Are The Ocean, You Me At Six etc.
